question_text: Why is it important to match a replacement laptop battery to the exact model of the laptop?
answer_options: Batteries from other brands provide better power efficiency
Laptop battery slots use standard shapes across all brands
Battery form factors and pin layouts vary between models
You can only charge original batteries using proprietary tools
correct_answer: Battery form factors and pin layouts vary between models
explanation: Different laptop models use uniquely shaped batteries with specific connectors, so compatibility is critical.
